title: Dungeon Siege 2
notes: runs but there is a huge black square instead of cursor, main character's head is black, strange cursor behavior

title: Dungeon Siege 2
notes: The cursor and the main character's head is black. However the game functions. The mouse cursor being a black box could be distracting enough to make this game Unstable. Depends on how much you want to play

Black cursor and black hero head was fixed after installing d3dx9 using winetricks. Runtime Config Options did not help.

WINEPREFIX="$HOME/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/39200/pfx" winetricks d3dx9
title: Dungeon Siege II
